trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: This update includes minor bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements.
trans-unit.target: Dizze fernijing omfettet lytse bugfixes, oanpassingen yn de brûkersinterface en oare prestaasjesferbetteringen.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: It also introduces a new option to reset Mozilla VPN to its default settings. This can be helpful if you’re experiencing instability or crashes with the application, and other troubleshooting steps haven’t resolved the issue.
trans-unit.target: It yntrodusearret ek in nije opsje om Mozilla VPN werom te setten nei de standertynstellingen. Dit kin nuttich wêze as jo ynstabiliteit of crashes ûnderfine mei de applikaasje, en oare stappen foar probleemoplossing it probleem net oplost hawwe.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Sa kinne jo Mozilla VPN opnij inisjalisearje:

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Click or tap on the gear icon to access Settings.
trans-unit.target: Klik of tik op it kamrêdpiktogram om nei Ynstellingen te gean.

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Navigate to the Get help section.
trans-unit.target: Navigearje nei de seksje Help krije.

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Look for the new Reset VPN option and follow the on-screen instructions.
trans-unit.target: Sykje nei de nije opsje VPN opnij inisjalisearje en folgje de ynstruksjes op it skerm.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Thank you for installing the latest version!
trans-unit.target: Tank foar it ynstallearjen fan de nijste ferzje!

trans-unit.source: You’re using the latest version of Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Jo brûke de nijste ferzje fan Mozilla VPN.
Jo hawwe bywurke nei Mozilla VPN 2.22
